Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game where players explore procedurally generated underground worlds, mine resources, trade with others, and upgrade their equipment. The game features real-time multiplayer networking through MQTT, a shop system for upgrades and trading, teleporters for fast travel, and comprehensive admin controls. Built with HTML5 Canvas for rendering and IndexedDB for local persistence, it supports both desktop and mobile play with touch controls and cloud save syncing capabilities.
